html:
2025-0509
2025-06-13FINCanadian International Trade Tribunal ActRegulations Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Procurement Inquiry Regulations Regulations Amending the CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL PROCUREMENT INQUIRY REGULATIONS in order to (1) clarify which businesses have standing to bring a complaint before the CITT; (2) clarify that a "potential supplier" is limited to Canadian businesses or businesses of a trade agreement country with procurement trade obligations; and (3) provide interpretive principles for and support implementation of these changes.N/A
subject: Regulations Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Procurement Inquiry Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL PROCUREMENT INQUIRY REGULATIONS in order to (1) clarify which businesses have standing to bring a complaint before the CITT; (2) clarify that a "potential supplier" is limited to Canadian businesses or businesses of a trade agreement country with procurement trade obligations; and (3) provide interpretive principles for and support implementation of these changes.
